title: The Reincarnated Hunter’s Magic Exploration - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Martial Arts   Supernatural
author: Yerin   예린채린
description:
Korean salaryman Jo Yeong-Suk, the symbol of Murim Jang Pal.

I don’t know why but I keep reincarnating or possessing another person?

This time, I’m the son of a huntsman of a fantasy world?

From a huntsman to a mercenary, then a monster hunter who specializes in venturing through magic caves~

A story of fantasy and growth of the main character Kahn, who leads the ever so eventful life~!>
